name: clipshield
title: ClipShield
description: Monitor clipboard for sensitive data (credit cards, SSN/SIN) and auto-clear it
author: maferland

commands.name: monitor
commands.title: Monitor Clipboard
commands.description: Background clipboard monitor for sensitive data

commands.name: scan
commands.title: Scan Clipboard Now
commands.description: Check current clipboard for sensitive data and clear if found

preferences.name: clearDelay
preferences.title: Clear Delay (seconds)
preferences.description: Seconds to wait before clearing sensitive clipboard data

preferences.name: enableCC
preferences.title: Detect Credit Cards
preferences.description: Detect credit card numbers (Visa, Mastercard, Amex, etc.)
preferences.label: Enable

preferences.name: showNotification
preferences.title: Show Notification
preferences.description: Show HUD notification when clipboard is cleared
preferences.label: Enable
